title: get_supply_summary
description: Test the GET /api/economy/supply endpoint to verify it returns the correct supply summary with status 200.

title: list_supply_transactions_with_limit
description: Test the GET /api/economy/supply/txs endpoint with a limit query parameter to ensure it returns a list of supply transactions correctly.

title: supply_sse_stream
description: Test the GET /api/economy/supply/stream endpoint to verify it establishes a Server-Sent Events stream for real-time supply updates.

title: list_users_with_fires_pagination_and_search
description: Test the GET /api/economy/users endpoint with cursor, limit, and search query parameters to verify it returns a paginated and filtered list of users with their fires.

title: get_user_fires_history_with_pagination
description: Test the GET /api/economy/history/{userId} endpoint with userId path parameter and limit and offset query parameters to verify it returns the user's fires transaction history.

title: list_sponsors
description: Test the GET /api/economy/sponsors endpoint to verify it returns the list of sponsors with status 200.

title: add_sponsor_as_admin
description: Test the POST /api/economy/sponsors/add endpoint with valid sponsor data to verify that an admin can add a new sponsor successfully.

title: transfer_fires_as_sponsor
description: Test the POST /api/economy/transfer endpoint with valid fromUserId, toUserId, amount, and optional reason and sponsorKey to verify fires transfer functionality.

title: get_xp_thresholds
description: Test the GET /api/xp/config endpoint to verify it returns the current XP thresholds configuration.

title: update_xp_thresholds
description: Test the POST /api/xp/config endpoint with a valid thresholds object to verify that XP thresholds can be updated successfully.
